Package eecs.jago.instructor.flowers

Extensions to the Jago simulation, specific to one instructor.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Concertina An implementation of concertina wire.
DeadTank A variation of a SolidElement that is just a stationary destroyed tank.
DozerBot This robot has a blade and a light sensor on RCX-1, it suffers if runs into concertina or dead tanks, and it can remove mines.
JavaBall  
Mine A mine that will be removed only by a DozerBot.
StockExchange A DetonatorSimulation with the title "NYSE".
